org.apache.commons.math4.util

Class IntegerSequence

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.commons.math4.util.IntegerSequence

  • public class IntegerSequence
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides a sequence of integers.
    Since:
    3.6

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  IntegerSequence.Incrementor
      Utility that increments a counter until a maximum is reached, at which point, the instance will by default throw a MaxCountExceededException.

      Creates a sequence \( a_i, i < 0 <= n \) where \( a_i = start + i * step \) and \( n \) is such that \( a_n <= max \) and \( a_{n+1} > max \).

    • Method Detail

      • range

        public static java.lang.Iterable<java.lang.Integer> range(int start,
                                                          int end)
        Creates a sequence [start .. end]. It calls range(start, end, 1).
        Parameters:
        start - First value of the range.
        end - Last value of the range.
        Returns:
        a range.

      • range

        public static java.lang.Iterable<java.lang.Integer> range(int start,
                                                          int max,
                                                          int step)
        Creates a sequence \( a_i, i < 0 <= n \) where \( a_i = start + i * step \) and \( n \) is such that \( a_n <= max \) and \( a_{n+1} > max \).
        Parameters:
        start - First value of the range.
        max - Last value of the range that satisfies the above construction rule.
        step - Increment.
        Returns:
        a range.

      • size

        public static int size(java.lang.Iterable<java.lang.Integer> range)
